DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine 2 hour glycemic response two bread product one dry lingonberry product . The average postprandial response product compare glycemic response ingestion control solution similar carbohydrate content ( glucose , glucose-fructose ) provide respective test product .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Effects Berry Grain Products Postprandial Glycemic Response Healthy Subjects
